Package com.multitenant.jwt.clients.controllers

Class ClientiController

java.lang.Object
com.multitenant.jwt.clients.controllers.ClientiController
@CrossOrigin(origins="*",
             maxAge=3600L)
@RestController
@RequestMapping("/api/clienti")
public class ClientiController
extends java.lang.Object
Author:
Roberto97 Controller of Clients. All the methods in this controller are under the path "/api/clienti" and in particular each one has it's relative path. All the methods are also with a different http method between GET, POS and DELETE.

  • Method Details

    • checkBasicAuth

      @GetMapping(value="/auth", produces="application/json") public java.lang.String checkBasicAuth()

    • insertCli

      @PostMapping(value="/inserisci", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Clienti> insertCli​(@RequestBody Clienti NewCliente)
      Method used to inserrt a client in the DB. It get, by post request, the client object and thanks to the Salva method of the clientiService, it add the client to the DB
      Parameters:
      NewCliente - Oggetto cliente creato nella form react
      Returns:
      Entity of Clienti type and CREATED status

    • listAllCli

      @RequestMapping(value="/cerca/all", method=GET, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.ArrayList<Clienti>> listAllCli()

    • deleteCli

      @DeleteMapping(value="/elimina/{id}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Void> deleteCli​(@PathVariable("id") java.lang.String Id)

      @RequestMapping(value="/cerca/codice/{codfid}", method=GET, produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Clienti> getCliByCode​(@PathVariable("codfid") java.lang.String CodFid)

      @GetMapping(value="/cerca/nominativo/{filter}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.ArrayList<Clienti>> getCliByNom​(@PathVariable("filter") java.lang.String Nominativo)
